activities:
Collect, transfer and use of Employees data for: recruitment and staffing; administration of compensation and benefit programs; time and expense management and other workplace administration; performance management and training; talent management, advancement and succession planning; identity verification and authentication, including system administration and access credentialing; providing advanced prevention, detection, response and intelligence capabilities to protect client and employee personal data; legal compliance and risk management; corporate audit, analysis and consolidated reporting and other legal and customary business-related purposes, such as making back-up copies of files for business continuity, as needed for computer system maintenance and other everyday human resources purposes.

Collect, transfer and use Customers, Business Partners and Suppliers data for conducting business operations and processes, including providing Professional Services and Support.
address: 150 North Radnor Chester Road, Suite D100
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customers, Employees, Business Partners and Suppliers data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and/or Swiss Information Commissioner
